column1: the present disclosure relates to a robotic system including one or more self-propelled motorized vehicles 120 (spmv) whose motion is controlled in accordance with electronic image data acquired by one or more observing camera(s) 110 configured to image a scene including the spmv 120. in some embodiments, the spmv includes one or more on-board lights 124, and the spmv is operated according to analyzing images acquired by the observing camera before and after an illumination transition of one or more of the point-lights. some embodiments relate techniques to computer gaming and/or to stereoscopic image processing techniques.
